Summary

An experienced mobile developer with a passion for code quality. Driven by impact. Loves learning and sharing knowledge. Excited about Kotlin, cross platform development and voice applications.

Experience

App Developer, Android and iOS (Freelance)

04/2020 - 10/2020

Bund Für Umwelt Und Naturschutz (BUND)

Design app architecture and build a new version of ToxFox app, which helps consumers exercise their right to know about hazardous materials in consumer products. The app allows users to scan bar codes, search in a product database and request information from manufacturers.

  • Clean (layered) app architechture based on modules
  • Cross platform native development with Kotlin and Swift

Android Lead

03/2020 - 07/2020

Syncc

Designed app architecture and built an Android app for social music listening in a fast moving startup environment using state of the art Android development technologies.

  • Delivered first MVP and beta releases of the app.
  • Mentored a junior developer and advised on architectural decisions for the iOS version of the app.

Senior Android Developer (Consultant)

02/2019 - 02/2020

Sony

Developed and maintained Sony’s self support application that is installed on all recent Android devices produced by Sony. Supporting ca. 20 millions monthly active users.

  • Simplified and refactored modules in a large legacy code base with system level and third-party integrations.
  • Drove team efforts towards higher quality of code by introducing usage of Kotlin, unit tests, static analysis, error logging and advocating for good development practices.
  • Responsible for feature refinement and planning together with project lead.

Android Developer (Consultant)

08/2018 - 02/2019

Lequa AB

Developed and maintained an existing sophisticated solution within the digital identity domain.

  • Introduced usage of Kotlin language in production and test code.
  • Participated in team effort of increase test coverage and other quality improvement efforts.

Consultant - Lead Android Developer

05/2018 - 02/2020

HiQ Skåne AB

Developed and maintained Android apps for various clients in the south of Sweden.

  • Engaged in company internal Kotlin competence group.

Lead Android Developer

07/2017 - 03/2018

Pubfront ApS

Developed and maintained an Android app for reading ebooks and listening to audio books. White label solution, used by 3 clients in Scandinavia.

  • Extended in app audio playback functionality by replacing Media Player with Google’s ExoPlayer
  • Created and maintained automated testing setup using Circle CI and Firebase Test Lab.
  • Supervised and coordinated off-site developers.

Android Developer

09/2014 - 06/2017

Mobisol GmbH (now part of ENGIE)

Developed apps for company employees and customers in South East Africa. Apps assisted in daily operations related to the sale of solar home systems.

  • "Offline First" app design, due to limited network connectivity.
  • Implemented a software module for communication between an Android device and the company’s physical product over Bluetooth and USB.
  • Took part in all aspects of development including: collecting requirements, managing releases, maintaining the mobile development infrastructure, supervising developers and recruiting.

​Junior Full-Stack Software Developer

PD for Android​

2012 - Present
​Open source project maintainer

"PD-for-Android" is the Android port of the “libpd” project which is used by various apps as an audio engine.

  • Keep the library accesible to developers by updating its' build tools and updating it to use the latest libpd core version.
  • International collaboration in an open source project that has been in active development for over 20 years.
